Text.Value: *The bowl contains an ancient, rust-coloured bloodstain. It forms a neat disc, as if spilled calmly and willingly.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player looks at a large bowl being held by a Shar statue.  Close-up of a dried blood stain in the base of the bowl.

Text.Value: *Another trial, to judge the mettle of Lady Shar's initiates. This one would test their ability to navigate her sacred darkness.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart-only narration. Visuals should favour her here.

Avatar SH produces a dagger in her right hand and cuts their left hand with it. Contact with dagger and hand doesn't need to be seen - can just show dagger poised, then a close-up of the player wincing as the cut themselves off-camera. NOTE - dagger appears in cinematic only

Text.Value: I'll remember that, should you ever need something of me.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The (non-SH) player produces a dagger in their right hand and cuts their left hand with it. Contact with dagger and hand doesn't need to be seen - can just show dagger poised, then a close-up of the player wincing as the cut themselves off-camera. NOTE - dagger appears in cinematic only

Text.Value: Navigate the darkness to feel my embrace.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player looks at the Shar statue before them and hear's Shar's disembodied voice

EditorData.logicalname: Asked to do a trial before

Text.Value: *Another bowl, bearing the stains of an ancient blood offering.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player looks at a large bowl being held by a Shar statue.  Close-up of a dried blood stain in the base of the bowl.

Text.Value: *You recognise this as a trial, where initiates would prove themselves to Lady Shar. This one would test their ability to navigate her sacred darkness.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart-only narration. Visuals should favour her here.

Companion SH produces a dagger in her right hand and cuts their left hand with it. Contact with dagger and hand doesn't need to be seen - can just show dagger poised, then a close-up of the player wincing as the cut themselves off-camera. NOTE - dagger appears in cinematic only

Text.Value: Spill some of your blood in the bowl.
We're wasting time. Please, just let me do this.

EditorData.logicalname: Refused permission to do this trial before

Text.Value: Seems your determined to put our mutual trust to the test. Pity.
This is one of Lady Shar's trials. Allow me - please.

Synopsis: For when a player interacts with the trial statue to being the path of darkness/invisible platform trial.
